title: Rexed - Reptiles' king
body:
Living in the sands of Shurima is hard. You must learn to hide from sun and others, especially if you are a huge dinosaur which has just woke up after 100 millions of years...

History... I don't like writing long stories in English, so I'll just say, that Rexed is dinosaur turned back to life by black power, and mistakely connected with gold ores...

He doesn't have mana - he has fury (150 max)

**Passive - Prehistoric king:**
Rexed gets fury points for using W, E and R + Killing monsters. After every kill he gets (0,02*lvl*fury points) additional gold. Fury doesn't fade before death.


**Q - Hidden treasure:**
Cost: 5/10/15/20/25 gold
Rexed hides his head into ground for 0,5/0,5/0,75/1/1 seconds, getting (0,1/0,15/0,2/0,25/0,5*fury points)+1/2/3/4/5 gold and losing all fury points and throwing enemy in his radius up.

**W - Tail Slap:**
Cost: 10/20/30/40/50 gold
Rexed uses his tail to slap his enemy 3 times doing 10/20/30/40/50(+5% AD) inevitable damage to monsters and 5/10/15/20/25(+2.5% AD) inevitable damage to champions(damage is for every slap, so on the first level you have 30+15% ad damage). It also grants 10% of **damage done  to target **to nearby enemies. If he kill enemy, he gets 1.5 times more gold than normally. It gives 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 fury for every damaged enemy

**E - Gold Ring:**
Cost: 20/25/30/40/50
Rexed runs in circle, creating a little "arena" for 5 seconds, stunning all monsters for 0.5/0.75/1/1.5/2 seconds and slowing all champions inside by 5/10/15/20/25% for 0.5/0.75/1/1.5/2 seconds also gaining 1.3 times more gold for every killed enemy inside(E doesn't grants any damage at all; you must kill them in other way before arena fades, your allies also can kill enemies there) or getting 5% of gold gained by ally in it. Arena is greater for every skill stack. It gives 2/3/4/5/10 fury points for use


**R - Ancient howl:**
Cost: 50/75/100 gold
Rexed howls gaining 30/40/50 fury points, raising his attack speed by 20/35/50%, attack damage by (10%*fury)%  and movement speed by 50/75/100% for 10 seconds. If he kill champion in this period, his buff is extended by 2/3.5/5 seconds and he gets the spell cost back(only the first kill gives money back). It gives 25/50/50 fury for use

**Note:**
I think his skills will be good in jungle; you can see he gets greater amount of gold for killing, but he also loses his gold to use skills, so jungle is the best line for kill(His combo E>Q>W Will be awesome in my opinion, R is a fast way to help friends somewhere near. If he has good boots, it won't take a lot of time to get to ally :D


I think rexed should look similarily to tyranosaurus rex or pachycefalosaurus :D
